page.title: 19SHOPS AND POST OFFICE
page.content: We went to the Post Office and the post is collected at 6.00 a.m. and 4.00 p.m. The Post Office opens at 9.00 a.m. and closes at 5.30 p.m. They sell groceries, seeds and paints. We went to Prices Supermarket and it opens every day and it sells bread, ice cream, cakes, tins of food, sweets, books and cards. The owner gets up at 6.30 a.m. The bread is delivered at 7.15 a.m. It opens at 8.00 a.m. He has to go to the warehouse 3 times a week. He has 2 tills. Each night he puts money in the safe. He goes to the bank two times a week and he has to sweep the floor as well. We went to the shop by the canal. We found out that it opened from 8.00 a.m. until 5.00 p.m. and it sold post cards, crisps, sweets, ice cream, milk, bread and eggs.
